name: node-test-runner-starter-kit
description: A comprehensive boilerplate repository for Node.js Test Runner with TypeScript, ESM support, and modern testing best practices

scripts.test: npm run build && npm run build:tests && node --test --experimental-test-coverage dist/tests/*.test.js
scripts.test:coverage: npm run build && npm run build:tests && node --test --experimental-test-coverage --test-reporter=lcov --test-reporter-destination=coverage/lcov.info dist/tests/*.test.js
scripts.test:verbose: npm run build && npm run build:tests && node --test --test-reporter=spec dist/tests/*.test.js
scripts.test:json: npm run build && npm run build:tests && node --test --test-reporter=tap --test-reporter-destination=test-results.tap dist/tests/*.test.js
scripts.test:only: npm run build && npm run build:tests && node --test --test-only dist/tests/*.test.js
scripts.test:filter: npm run build && npm run build:tests && node --test --test-name-pattern dist/tests/*.test.js
scripts.test:snapshot: npm run build && npm run build:tests && node --test --test-update-snapshots dist/tests/*.test.js
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run test:coverage

author: Ludovico Besana
